Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won by 6 wickets with 9 balls remaining.
Wanindu Hasaranga was named Player of the Match for his 3/13 bowling figures.
Dhananjaya de Silva scored an unbeaten 66 off 42 balls.
Mujeeb Ur Rahman took 2 wickets for 24 runs.
Rashid Khan took 2 wickets for 31 runs.
Dhananjaya de Silva hit the winning four to seal the victory for Sri Lanka.
Post-Match Reflections: Mohammad Nabi, Afghanistan captain, reflected on the team's performance, mentioning the slow pitch and lack of momentum due to not playing for ten days.
Dasun Shanaka, Sri Lanka captain, praised Dhananjaya de Silva's performance and emphasized the importance of consistency.
Wanindu Hasaranga expressed happiness with the team's performance and his own bowling strategy.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan's last two matches were called off due to rain, affecting their momentum.
Sri Lanka moved to No. 3 in the Group 1 standings after this win.
